short_description: unaice is a software development services company based in werther (westf.), germany.
long_description: about us your specialists for content and data automation. we used a platform – that doesn't exist anymore – and fed it all the buzzwords we stand for. that's what makes us tick. we help companies in mastering current and future challenges of the digital era and thus boost their business. we automate content creation with great content, optimised data structuring as well as product searches and take sales and marketing processes to new and unprecedented levels of productivity. we accelerate processes and simplify the necessary effort. since our founding, we have worked on over 250 consulting projects and implementations with e-commerce companies, franchise providers, agencies and offices. project management, data specialist, data analysis and textual concept for text robot projects, development of lead strategies, lead campaigns, content creation, development of buyer personas, development of services as a product. digital media, social media, content marketing, digitalisation, robot journalism, automated text generation, online marketing, marketing strategy, content production and management, podcasting, publishing, editorial management, consulting.

generated_description: unaice, legally known as unaice gmbh, based in werther (westf.), north rhine-westphalia, specializes in content automation and data preparation. the company offers solutions such as the text robot for automated content production, news streams for news aggregation, and advanced search functions for online shops. unaice gmbh assists businesses in enhancing productivity and efficiency by automating content creation and data structuring. the company has completed over 250 consulting projects and implementations with various clients, including e-commerce companies, franchise providers, and agencies.
